description: Led migration from monolithic to microservices architecture, reducing document generation latency by 50% and improving system reliability to 99.99% SLO
Architected and implemented policy validation service achieving 70% coverage, exceeding the quarterly target of 60%

Collaborated with senior developers and a Principal Engineer to establish a comprehensive system observability strategy, enabling rapid debugging, reducing resolution times, and proactively resolving issues for enhanced customer experience and system reliability.
Technologies Used: gRPC, GraphQL, React, Golang, Terraform, Terragrunt, Flask, FastAPI, Python, AWS ECS, Secrets Manager, S3, Docker, Redis
Collaborated on software projects for diverse government and commercial clients, delivering solutions tailored to their specific needs.

projects.title: Agency Level Portal Service (ALPS)
details: Led the implementation of a centralized, cloud-native, scalable Agency-wide Library web portal.
Significantly reduced redundancy across NASA sites, resulting in cost savings amounting to billions of dollars.
Technologies Used: Wagtail (Django-based CMS), Python, AWS ClouldFormation, S3, RDS, EC2, SSM, Docker

projects.title: images.nasa.gov (AVAIL)
details: Maintained and expanded the images.nasa.gov website, contributing to its continued functionality and growth.
Technologies Used: Pyramid, Python, AWS S3, RDS, EC2, SSM, Docker
